person.persName: Andrew H. Herod (Kenton County, Kentucky, jailor)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, jailor. Kentucky native. Married Mary A. Herod. Father of George W. Herod, Aladelphia Herod, Susan Herod, and Andrew H. Herod. Jailor of Kenton County from 1856 to 1864.
